Name: BasementVR
About the game: Be Creative. Be Social. Explore! BasementVR gives you the possibility to express yourself in your own room with 3d drawing, objects and various media types such as images and gifs. Invite friends and create together, talk, watch YouTube and browse web. - Create and have fun - Work and brainstorm - Showcase your artworks - Explore rooms of other users
